articles.title: Uddhav was keen on alliance with BJP, had met PM: Rahul Shewale
articles.description: Speaking to mediapersons in New Delhi, Shewale claimed that the patch-up did not occur due to the antagonistic stand taken by certain members of the Sena against the BJP and Thackeray’s procrastination.

articles.title: "Take Bra In Hand And Leave": Kerala Girl Describes NEET Exam Horror
articles.description: A teen in Kerala's Kollam, one of the many allegedly forced to remove her bra before the NEET medical entrance exam on Sunday, has described her humiliation as she sat for the exam using her hair to cover her chest.
articles.content:
